verses.verse: וַיְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi were allotted הַגּוֹרָל֙ <S%H1486><s%> hag-go-Ral There was also a lot לְמַטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> le-mat-Teh for the tribe מְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <S%H4519><s%> me-nash-Sheh, of Manasseh כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- because ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he בְּכ֣וֹר <S%H1060><s%> be-Chor for he [was] the firstborn יוֹסֵ֑ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef; of Joseph לְמָכִיר֩ <S%H4353><s%> le-ma-Chir [to wit] for Machir בְּכ֨וֹר <S%H1060><s%> be-Chor the firstborn מְנַשֶּׁ֜ה <S%H4519><s%> me-nash-Sheh of Manasseh אֲבִ֣י <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi the father הַגִּלְעָ֗ד <S%H1568><s%> hag-gil-'Ad, of Gilead כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki because ה֤וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he הָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah were allotted אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish because he was a man מִלְחָמָ֔ה <S%H4421><s%> mil-cha-Mah, of war וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> vay-hi- were allotted ל֖וֹ lo הַגִּלְעָ֥ד <S%H1568><s%> hag-gil-'Ad therefore he had Gilead וְהַבָּשָֽׁן׃ <S%H1316><s%> ve-hab-ba-Shan. and Bashan

וַ֠יְהִי <S%H1961><s%> Vay-hi become לִבְנֵ֨י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei of the children מְנַשֶּׁ֥ה <S%H4519><s%> me-nash-Sheh of Manasseh הַנּוֹתָרִים֮ <S%H3498><s%> han-no-ta-Rim There was also [a lot] for the rest לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָם֒ <S%H4940><s%> le-mish-pe-cho-Tam by their families לִבְנֵ֨י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei for the children אֲבִיעֶ֜זֶר <S%H44><s%> 'a-vi-'E-zer of Abiezer וְלִבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-liv-nei- and for the children חֵ֗לֶק <S%H2507><s%> Che-lek, of Helek וְלִבְנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> ve-liv-Nei and for the children אַשְׂרִיאֵל֙ <S%H844><s%> 'as-ri-'El of Asriel וְלִבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-liv-nei- and for the children שֶׁ֔כֶם <S%H7928><s%> She-chem, of Shechem וְלִבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-liv-nei- and for the children חֵ֖פֶר <S%H2660><s%> Che-fer of Hepher וְלִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> ve-liv-Nei and for the children שְׁמִידָ֑ע <S%H8061><s%> she-mi-Da'; of Shemida אֵ֠לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh these בְּנֵ֨י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei children מְנַשֶּׁ֧ה <S%H4519><s%> me-nash-Sheh of Manasseh בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son יוֹסֵ֛ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef of Joseph הַזְּכָרִ֖ים <S%H2145><s%> haz-ze-cha-Rim these [were] the male לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָֽם׃ <S%H4940><s%> le-mish-pe-cho-Tam. by their families

וְלִצְלָפְחָד֩ <S%H6765><s%> ve-litz-la-fe-Chad But Zelophehad בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son חֵ֨פֶר <S%H2660><s%> Che-fer of Hepher בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son גִּלְעָ֜ד <S%H1568><s%> gil-'Ad of Gilead בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son מָכִ֣יר <S%H4353><s%> ma-Chir of Machir בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son מְנַשֶּׁ֗ה <S%H4519><s%> me-nash-Sheh, of Manasseh לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- no הָ֥יוּ <S%H1961><s%> Ha-yu had ל֛וֹ lo בָּנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nim had no sons כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- lo בָּנ֑וֹת <S%H1323><s%> ba-Not; but daughters וְאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <S%H428><s%> ve-'El-leh and these שְׁמ֣וֹת <S%H8034><s%> she-Mot and these [are] the names בְּנֹתָ֔יו <S%H1323><s%> be-no-Tav, of his daughters מַחְלָ֣ה <S%H4244><s%> mach-Lah Mahlah וְנֹעָ֔ה <S%H5270><s%> ve-no-'Ah, and Noah חָגְלָ֥ה <S%H2295><s%> cha-ge-Lah Hoglah מִלְכָּ֖ה <S%H4435><s%> mil-Kah Milcah וְתִרְצָֽה׃ <S%H8656><s%> ve-tir-Tzah. and Tirzah

וַתִּקְרַ֡בְנָה <S%H7126><s%> vat-tik-Rav-nah And they came near לִפְנֵי֩ <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before אֶלְעָזָ֨ר <S%H499><s%> 'el-'a-Zar Eleazar הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen the priest וְלִפְנֵ֣י׀ <S%H6440><s%> ve-lif-Nei and before יְהוֹשֻׁ֣עַ <S%H3091><s%> ye-ho-Shu-a' Joshua בִּן־ <S%H1121><s%> bin- the son נ֗וּן <S%H5126><s%> Nun, of Nun וְלִפְנֵ֤י <S%H6440><s%> ve-lif-Nei and before הַנְּשִׂיאִים֙ <S%H5387><s%> han-ne-si-'Im the princes לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, saying יְהוָה֙ <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God צִוָּ֣ה <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vah commanded אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh, Moses לָֽתֶת־ <S%H5414><s%> la-tet- to give לָ֥נוּ La-nu נַחֲלָ֖ה <S%H5159><s%> na-cha-Lah us an inheritance בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> be-Toch among אַחֵ֑ינוּ <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chei-nu; our brethren וַיִּתֵּ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-Ten he gave לָהֶ֜ם la-Hem אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- according פִּ֤י <S%H6310><s%> pi Therefore according to the commandment יְהוָה֙ <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God נַֽחֲלָ֔ה <S%H5159><s%> na-cha-Lah, them an inheritance בְּת֖וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> be-Toch among אֲחֵ֥י <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chei the brethren אֲבִיהֶֽן׃ <S%H1><s%> 'a-vi-Hen. of their father

וַיִּפְּל֥וּ <S%H5307><s%> vai-yip-pe-Lu And there fell חַבְלֵֽי־ <S%H2256><s%> chav-lei- portions מְנַשֶּׁ֖ה <S%H4519><s%> me-nash-Sheh to Manasseh עֲשָׂרָ֑ה <S%H6235><s%> 'a-sa-Rah; ten לְבַ֞ד <S%H905><s%> le-Vad alone מֵאֶ֤רֶץ <S%H776><s%> me-'E-retz beside the land הַגִּלְעָד֙ <S%H1568><s%> hag-gil-'Ad of Gilead וְהַבָּשָׁ֔ן <S%H1316><s%> ve-hab-ba-Shan, and Bashan אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which מֵעֵ֥בֶר <S%H5676><s%> me-'E-ver which [were] on the other side לַיַּרְדֵּֽן׃ <S%H3383><s%> lai-yar-Den. Jordan

כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> ki because בְּנ֣וֹת <S%H1323><s%> be-Not Because the daughters מְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <S%H4519><s%> me-nash-Sheh, of Manasseh נָחֲל֥וּ <S%H5157><s%> na-cha-Lu had נַחֲלָ֖ה <S%H5159><s%> na-cha-Lah an inheritance בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> be-Toch among בָּנָ֑יו <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nav; his sons וְאֶ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> ve-'E-retz had the land הַגִּלְעָ֔ד <S%H1568><s%> hag-gil-'Ad, of Gilead הָיְתָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-ye-Tah belonged לִבְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> liv-nei- sons מְנַשֶּׁ֖ה <S%H4519><s%> me-nash-Sheh of Manasseh's הַנּֽוֹתָרִֽים׃ <S%H3498><s%> han-No-ta-Rim. and the rest

וַיְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi ran גְבוּל־ <S%H1366><s%> ge-Vul And the coast מְנַשֶּׁה֙ <S%H4519><s%> me-nash-Sheh of Manasseh מֵֽאָשֵׁ֔ר <S%H836><s%> me-'a-Sher, was from Asher הַֽמִּכְמְתָ֔ת <S%H4366><s%> ham-mich-me-Tat, to Michmethah אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- that פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei that [lieth] before שְׁכֶ֑ם <S%H7927><s%> she-Chem; Shechem וְהָלַ֤ךְ <S%H1980><s%> ve-ha-Lach went along הַגְּבוּל֙ <S%H1366><s%> hag-ge-Vul and the border אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about הַיָּמִ֔ין <S%H3225><s%> hai-ya-Min, on the right hand אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יֹשְׁבֵ֖י <S%H3427><s%> yo-she-Vei unto the inhabitants עֵ֥ין 'ein תַּפּֽוּחַ׃ <S%H5887><s%> tap-Pu-ach. of Entappuah

לִמְנַשֶּׁ֕ה <S%H4519><s%> lim-nash-Sheh [Now] Manasseh הָיְתָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-ye-Tah belonged אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz had the land תַּפּ֑וּחַ <S%H8599><s%> tap-Pu-ach; of Tappuah וְתַפּ֛וּחַ <S%H8599><s%> ve-tap-Pu-ach but Tappuah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- on גְּב֥וּל <S%H1366><s%> ge-Vul on the border מְנַשֶּׁ֖ה <S%H4519><s%> me-nash-Sheh of Manasseh לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei [belonged] to the children אֶפְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H669><s%> 'ef-Ra-yim. of Ephraim

וְיָרַ֣ד <S%H3381><s%> ve-ya-Rad descended הַגְּבוּל֩ <S%H1366><s%> hag-ge-Vul And the coast נַ֨חַל <S%H5158><s%> Na-chal unto the river קָנָ֜ה <S%H7071><s%> ka-Nah Kanah נֶ֣גְבָּה <S%H5045><s%> Neg-bah southward לַנַּ֗חַל <S%H5158><s%> lan-Na-chal, of the river עָרִ֤ים <S%H5892><s%> 'a-Rim these cities הָאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh לְאֶפְרַ֔יִם <S%H669><s%> le-'ef-Ra-yim, of Ephraim בְּת֖וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> be-Toch [are] among עָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> 'a-Rei the cities מְנַשֶּׁ֑ה <S%H4519><s%> me-nash-Sheh; of Manasseh וּגְב֤וּל <S%H1366><s%> u-ge-Vul the coast מְנַשֶּׁה֙ <S%H4519><s%> me-nash-Sheh of Manasseh מִצְּפ֣וֹן <S%H6828><s%> mitz-tze-Fon also [was] on the north side לַנַּ֔חַל <S%H5158><s%> lan-Na-chal, of the river וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become תֹצְאֹתָ֖יו <S%H8444><s%> to-tze-'o-Tav and the outgoings הַיָּֽמָּה׃ <S%H3220><s%> hai-Yam-mah. of it were at the sea

נֶ֣גְבָּה <S%H5045><s%> Neg-bah Southward לְאֶפְרַ֗יִם <S%H669><s%> le-'ef-Ra-yim, [it was] Ephraim's וְצָפ֙וֹנָה֙ <S%H6828><s%> ve-tza-Fo-nah and northward לִמְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <S%H4519><s%> lim-nash-Sheh, [it was] Manasseh's וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become הַיָּ֖ם <S%H3220><s%> hai-Yam and the sea גְּבוּל֑וֹ <S%H1366><s%> ge-vu-Lo; is his border וּבְאָשֵׁר֙ <S%H836><s%> u-ve-'a-Sher in Asher יִפְגְּע֣וּן <S%H6293><s%> yif-ge-'Un and they met together מִצָּפ֔וֹן <S%H6828><s%> mitz-tza-Fon, on the north וּבְיִשָּׂשכָ֖ר <S%H3485><s%> u-ve-yis-so-sh-Char and in Issachar מִמִּזְרָֽח׃ <S%H4217><s%> mi-miz-Rach. on the east

וַיְהִ֨י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi had לִמְנַשֶּׁ֜ה <S%H4519><s%> lim-nash-Sheh And Manasseh בְּיִשָּׂשכָ֣ר <S%H3485><s%> be-yis-so-sh-Char had in Issachar וּבְאָשֵׁ֗ר <S%H836><s%> u-ve-'a-Sher, and in Asher בֵּית־ beit- שְׁאָ֣ן <S%H1052><s%> she-'An Bethshean וּ֠בְנוֹתֶיהָ <S%H1323><s%> U-ve-no-tei-ha and her towns וְיִבְלְעָ֨ם <S%H2991><s%> ve-yiv-le-'Am and Ibleam וּבְנוֹתֶ֜יהָ <S%H1323><s%> u-ve-no-Tei-ha and her towns וְֽאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et יֹשְׁבֵ֧י <S%H3427><s%> yo-she-Vei and the inhabitants דֹ֣אר <S%H1756><s%> dor of Dor וּבְנוֹתֶ֗יהָ <S%H1323><s%> u-ve-no-Tei-ha, and her towns וְיֹשְׁבֵ֤י <S%H3427><s%> ve-yo-she-Vei and the inhabitants עֵֽין־ 'ein- דֹּר֙ <S%H5874><s%> dor of Endor וּבְנֹתֶ֔יהָ <S%H1323><s%> u-ve-no-Tei-ha, and her towns וְיֹשְׁבֵ֤י <S%H3427><s%> ve-yo-she-Vei and the inhabitants תַעְנַךְ֙ <S%H8590><s%> ta'-naCh of Taanach וּבְנֹתֶ֔יהָ <S%H1323><s%> u-ve-no-Tei-ha, and her towns וְיֹשְׁבֵ֥י <S%H3427><s%> ve-yo-she-Vei and the inhabitants מְגִדּ֖וֹ <S%H4023><s%> me-gid-Do of Megiddo וּבְנוֹתֶ֑יהָ <S%H1323><s%> u-ve-no-Tei-ha; and her towns שְׁלֹ֖שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> she-Lo-shet [even] three הַנָּֽפֶת׃ <S%H5316><s%> han-Na-fet. countries

וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo not יָכְלוּ֙ <S%H3201><s%> ya-che-Lu could בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei Yet the children מְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <S%H4519><s%> me-nash-Sheh, of Manasseh לְהוֹרִ֖ישׁ <S%H3423><s%> le-ho-Rish not drive out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הֶֽעָרִ֣ים <S%H5892><s%> he-'a-Rim [the inhabitants of] those cities הָאֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh; of these וַיּ֙וֹאֶל֙ <S%H2974><s%> vai-Yo-'el would הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֔י <S%H3669><s%> hak-ke-na-'a-Ni, but the Canaanites לָשֶׁ֖בֶת <S%H3427><s%> la-She-vet dwell בָּאָ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ba-'A-retz in that land הַזֹּֽאת׃ <S%H2063><s%> haz-Zot. It
